ygData.subject: Re: shoulder slots
ygData.msgSnippet: Easy answer:  it depends  Seriously,  it does depend on what your stats are now (ie what other equipment do you have?) Do you already have decent AC
ygData.messageBody:
Easy answer: "it depends" <g>

Seriously, it does depend on what your stats are now (ie what other
equipment do you have?)

Do you already have decent AC (wearing bronze, steel or lambent?)

Do you already have good MR? (Have runed bone fork, other MR stuff?)

Does it matter? Do you fight casters alot? Bandits, etc? Or do you mainly
fight bugs & beasts?

Can you have both and switch as you need to?

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of 43 songs (ding!)
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

From: MICHELLE M BODIE <LEIAORGANA@...>

> Which do you think would be better for my lvl 19 bard? Bloodstained
mantle
> or crested spaulders. The spaulder give more ac, but the mantle gives str
> and sv magic.
